name: Dodge the Lasers
description:
DOWNLOAD THE 'V4' FILE IF YOU WANT TO PLAY THE LATEST VERSION

Controls: 

Walk // A-D, Arrows

Jump // Space, Z

Pause // Esc

Fullscreen Toggle // F11

RELEASE NOTES:

*This version wasn't completely tested, there may be some bugs. If you find any, please tell to me in the comments :D I'll fix them in a next version*

- Save system! Now your high score is saved when you close the game. Please don't try to hack this system, play legit :)

- Now your skin appears in lobby

- improved menus, settings screen added

- Now you can change your skin in the settings screen

- You can reset you high score in the settings screen

- Discord Rich presence updated

- Added some features

- Bug and Glitch fixing

- Added more sounds
